ModMetaData.name: Toggle Hidden Conduit Selectability (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: b0unt9
ModMetaData.description:
[b]Hidden Conduit Selectability (1.6 Update)[/b]
This is an updated version of the original [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3393599165]"Hidden Conduit Selectability"[/url] mod by MaskedPixel, reworked to support [b]RimWorld 1.6[/b].
The original mod added a toggle button to the map overlay UI, allowing players to choose whether **Hidden Conduits** (invisible power lines) should be selectable in the game. This updated version keeps the same functionality while simplifying the implementation.
[h1]Features:[/h1] [list] [*]Adds a [b]toggle button[/b] to the top map controls that allows players to make Hidden Conduits selectable or unselectable. [/list]
[h1]Differences from the Original Mod:[/h1]
[list] [*]Updated for RimWorld 1.6. [*]Replaced the [b]Harmony Transpiler patch[/b] with a [b]simpler Postfix patch[/b] using `DoMapControls`, making the code easier to read and maintain. [*]No changes to the core gameplay — only refactoring and version compatibility adjustments. [/list]
[h1]Notes:[/h1] [list] [*]This is [i]not an official update[/i] by the original author. [*]Functionality is preserved 1:1 with the original — only the internal patching logic was improved. [*]Compatible with existing saves and should be safe to add or remove mid-game. [/list]
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]Original mod by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198089998393]MaskedPixel[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3393599165]Steam Workshop Page[/url] [*]1.6 update and patch simplification by [url=https://github.com/b0unt9]Bounty[/url] [/list]
- If the original author requests this version be taken down or altered, I will comply immediately.
[h1]Compatibility:[/h1] [list] [*]Compatible with RimWorld 1.5 and 1.6. [*][b]Do not use this mod alongside the original[/b] — conflicts will occur [*]Compatible with most UI and overlay mods. [/list]
[h1]Feedback OR Suggestions:[/h1] Leave a comment or reach me on [url=https://github.com/rw-mod/Toggle-Hidden-Conduit-Selectability]GitHub[/url]
